extendedInfo.description: It's not about Dinosaur wars .Itâs about Filling Colors or matching up!Re-live a life with the worldâs oldest creatures Dinosaurs in this addictive game for preschoolers and toddlers. Dinosaurs are known to be one of the most dangerous creatures ever survived but Tommy the T Rex is not about fighting or some killing dragon story. Itâsall about fun, adventures and learning with Tommy T Rex, the friendly dinosaur.Tommy is naughty talking Rex while he takes kids to a ride of the facts associated to him. He is like jumping T Rex who jumps here and there to have fun. Itâs time for you to show your creative skills, coloring around with the T Rex dinosaur. Match them up in pairs to get good with your memory. Itâs not anything like cooking games and even not like Bistro Cook or the stand full of pizzas where you get only fun and nothing to learn.Tommy likes to discover the brightwood adventures and have fun with his talking friends. This interesting 4 in 1 app brings the moto of getting good memory and time management skills. Tommy the T Rex Big Adventure is not about the tiny angry creatures like the birds or the piggies and neither it is about some drag street racing or guns from thecity of crime. Itâs about creative coloring, learning facts about T Rex and card matching.First of all we have included a story about T Rex,based on true facts and HD images. This section is best for the story lovers, for reading and listening practices.Secondly we have integrated an Encyclopedia of T Rex Dinosaurs that includes various types of Dinosaurs and some amazing facts about them.Thirdly we have provided you a Memory Match Game for Free which includes colorful cards and beautiful flip animations. Timer for end result and it compares your current time with the Best time and this makes memory game more addictive.Fourthly we have integrated a Coloring book with 4 pictures for those who love art, painting, coloring, drawing n sketching and have a creative mind. It is a like a learning series for kids. Purple, pink, yellow, red, black and many more colors are available in the color pallet.***FEATURES***â Story based on facts and figures about T Rexâ High quality imagesâ Best for parents and kids who love storiesâ Improves reading and listening skillsâ Includes knowledge and information about T Rexâ Various types/kinds of T Rex and their speciesâ Encyclopedia has amazing facts about Dinosaursâ Three different size brushes available for kids to use and color withâ A wide range of Dynamic colors to choose while coloringâ Eraser tool to help you remove messed up colors and the Clear All button that cleans up all by itself while you sit back.â New and improve finger drawing method to enhance the game play instead of that old technique of tap and paint.â A rack of 20 cards ready to flipped and matched up in pairsâ Tap the cards to flip and see the hidden imageâ Tic-Toc timer to challenge the speed at which your kids are playing.â Time at the end tells how fast you completed the rack.â Original tic-toc timer sound.Get to next level which might be even more challenging after dashing away all the cards. Color the black and white images with different colors in this coloring book. Discover the adventurous things and challenge your brain for a memory test with T Rex. This 4 in 1 app is certainly a best choice than Zombies killing, death racing and fighting on the streets. It is not something very hard like being a frontline commando of an elite force who needs to run through someoneâs blood and glory. Itâs as informative as a learning series for kids. Itâs all about learning and educational stuff for the preschool kids. Wait for no longer and get this app on your smart phones.â¨***DISCLAIMER***â This free app is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen.

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: This app is terrible. So many ads and how can a child learn from this when the game doesnt even spell right. Look at the description. Did a child make this app?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Aargh!
reviews.comment: Can\'t get app to load. Keeps unexpectedly stopping. Uninstalling!
reviews.author: Jamie Boyd

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: My son is 3, & can use youtube, etc but always wants to read this book, & color! Great job making this app, do more with dinos! & if you habe boys or girls that love dinos download this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rigel
reviews.comment: This is educated game and i so like this game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: UnInstalled
reviews.comment: I always check apps before I let my 3 year old plays them and within 30 seconds a ad came on and covered whole screen which is clever cos lil fingers Will click onto add. U can\'t get the app unless u agree to let their 3rd party sponser to access ya info. The story shud be read out to the child and the colouring book pic is far to lil and doesn\'t give a option to change colour. Waste of time
reviews.author: Jen M

reviews.title: Push ads & Intrusive search icons on display
reviews.comment: I abhor sellout greedy developers that give us a \"free\" game for the kids. Using the word dinosaur as a lure and using our $200-300 smart phones, that cost us thousands once the yearly cycle of monthly charges is complete.  They make deals with 3rd party developers that can air push malware within free games offered, unbeknown to this developer. Our devices slow because of air push ads. If Goggle bought our devices it might be tolerable but they use the info gathered for their search engine and encourage it
reviews.author: James von Veit
